songs.title: Close to Me
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Intro]
Hitmaka

[Hook: Unknown]
I want you close to me, close to me
That's where you 'posed to be
I want you close to me, close to me
That's where you 'posed to be
And if you take your love away from me
I'll go crazy
I'll go crazy

[Verse : G-Eazy]
Yeah, I want you close to me girl you ain't no Thotiana
Yo my badgalriri, I sear you my Rihanna
The one I should've took care of, treat you like fine china
